name: Stars2D
description:
Antimatter, led by their evil boss, appear in our universe and destroy all the constellations in our night sky!
Now all the stars find themselves far from home, in different parts of infinite space.
Help the stars return home and restore order to their constellations.
You will have to solve a lot of exciting puzzles to rebuild the constellations, to help stars avoid dangerous encounters with antimatter and to come up with a way to defeat the evil boss.
But more than that, while playing this game, you can also become familiar with all the constellations in our night sky and learn many interesting things about the stars that make up these constellations.

More information:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/updates/630933355
